jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
The GoMerchant team is a product-engineering team that is working to create an ecosystem of solutions to support merchants on the Gojek platform to better manage and grow their business. As one of the key stakeholders in the Gojek ecosystem, merchants are involved in various offerings such as food delivery, offline payment acceptance, POS, financial services, deals and promotions. 

The job of the GoMerchant team is to understand the needs of the merchants and  build platforms and interfaces (mobile apps & web apps) that will enable them to be successful on the Gojek platform.

The GoMerchant team is looking for an experienced, highly technical, data-driven Product Manager to manage data stream and allied flows for CMP (Centralized Merchant Platform). CMP is the nerve center for all merchant data, and enables revenue flow for all of Gojek services with a merchant offprint such as food, pay, Life, etc. It is a multi-faceted OMS, with more than 20 Microservices with more branches added every day. We are looking for a PM for one of the branches-which will manage data sanctity and sanity across the different portals within the ecosystem. This person would be working with 4 engineers to start with and will be largely an individual contributor role to start with.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Managing and supporting engineers in your product group, providing them with guidance and mentorship to maximize their potential.
  • Defining OKRs for your product area and hold your team accountable for setting and achieving their individual OKRs
  • Driving product strategy for your product area, partnering with your product development team and cross-functional stakeholders to create and execute on the prioritised roadmap
  • Setting an example for your team to be customer-focused by leading customer research efforts and always tying your work back to our customers
  • Partnering with other team leads and company leadership to ensure that product OKRs and roadmaps are aligned

• BEngg/BS degree or equivalent practical experience preferably an analytically driven field1-3 years of product experience preferably some experience as a hands-on developer as well
  • Successful track record in planning, developing, and executing strategy for multiple projects while collaborating cross-functionally
  • Ability to easily transition from high level strategic thinking to creative and detailed execution
  • Having an entrepreneurial and are comfortable working in a complex and face-paced environment
  • Analytical and data-driven, you love digging into the data to understand what’s happening and define & measure success on every project
  • Passionate about customers and always bring questions back to what will serve them best
  • Fluent in English and a confident communicator 
  • Experience as a software engineer/developer and working with distributed teams are highly desired
